name: bazi-analyzer
description: 八字分析系统 - 整合八字计算和大模型分析

scripts.test-tts: node -e "(async()=>{const {synthesizeSpeech}=require('./tts_client');const fs=require('fs');const r=await synthesizeSpeech({text:'道友好，贫道在此为你解疑。',voiceType:'qiniu_zh_male_ybxknjs',model:'tts',format:'mp3'});if(r.success){fs.writeFileSync('tts_sample.mp3',r.audioBuffer);console.log('ok: tts_sample.mp3');}else{console.error('fail:',r.error);}})()"
